abstract: This word has appeared in 70 New York Times articles in the past year.
snippet: This word has appeared in 70 New York Times articles in the past year.
lead_paragraph: noun: container for coal; shaped to permit pouring the coal onto the firenoun: an entrance equipped with a hatch; especially a passageway between decks of a shipverb: to move about or proceed hurriedlyverb: to deliberately cause something to fail
